start_message:
Hello! Welcome to Anonymous Chat Bot.

Use /next to start an anonymous chat.
partner_stop_message: Your chat partner has stopped the conversation.
no_chat_message: You have not started a chat. Use /next to start.
error_message: An error occurred. You cannot send messages to yourself.
block_message: Failed to send message The chat partner may have left the conversation.
info_media:
**Please choose **:
on - to show media
off - to hide media
Media Status: {}
